security: Revealing internal clearance processes for personnel operating in sensitive areas could expose intelligence operations. Specifically, detailing that 'Mr. Greer P. Hanvey cleared per REF request' and the proposed use of a 'WAVE area as Maritime c/0' indicates operational planning and personnel deployment.
summary: A message indicating Greer P. Hanvey has been cleared per reference request and a request for priority amendment to permit use of subject WAVE area as Maritime c/0.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET message, dated December 5, 1963, from SAS to DIRECTOR and others, indicates that Mr. Greer P. Hanvey has been cleared according to a reference request. Additionally, it includes a C/S comment from SAS requesting a priority amendment to allow the use of a WAVE area as a Maritime c/0, indicating potential operational use of the designated area.
title: Greer P. Hanvey Clearance and WAVE Area Usage
